fr.ign.cogit.geoxygene.util.gl

Class GLGradientComplex

  • Object
    • AbstractGLComplex<GLSimpleVertex>
      • GLGradientComplex
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GLComplex

    public class GLGradientComplex
extends AbstractGLComplex<GLSimpleVertex>
implements GLComplex
    GL Primitive is a representation of a 2D Object with 2D coordinates, Texture coordinates and Color components It is composed of primitives types which are themselves composed of index lists so it can mix different type of primitives, but the insertion order is not kept
    Author:
    JeT

      • setOverallOpacity

        public void setOverallOpacity(double overallOpacity)
        Overall opacity is used to set the opacity of the FBO in which this object has been drawn without an transparency. Set the vertices opacity to 1
